name: eventinfosite
description: Display events from evento api to add this to entrance of a buildung or of a room.

scripts.build: cp README.md dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/ && cp settings.js.example dist/settings.js && cp app.js dist/ && minify app.css > dist/app.css && minify index.html > dist/index.html

author: bkd-mba-fbi
